changeSet.author: chengche@broadinstitute.org
changeSet.sql: CREATE TYPE AllOfUsArrays AS ( id bigint, -- unique to this table analysis_version_number bigint, -- input to the workflow chip_well_barcode text, -- input to the workflow green_idat_cloud_path text, -- input to the workflow params_file text, -- input to the workflow red_idat_cloud_path text, -- input to the workflow reported_gender text, -- input to the workflow sample_alias text, -- input to the workflow sample_lsid text, -- input to the workflow bead_pool_manifest_file text, -- input to the workflow cluster_file text, -- input to the workflow zcall_thresholds_file text, -- input to the workflow gender_cluster_file text, -- input to the workflow extended_chip_manifest_file text, -- input to the workflow updated timestamptz, -- status update time uuid text -- Cromwell workflow UUID )
